item.title: Pistol to Machine Gun Switches Illegal in at Least Half of States
item.description: In New Mexico, police and prosecutors backed an effort to outlaw devices that convert pistols into machine guns.

item.title: WH Correspondents' Dinner Drops Headliner Amid Trump Tensions

item.title: Iran's President Rejects Trump's Request for Direct Negotiations
